name: gobol
description: GOBOL Language Server extention for vscode
author: Jo√£o Machado

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd .. && npm run setup_server
scripts.clone_server: rm -rf server && git clone https://github.com/jtomaspm/GOBOL-LSP server_build
scripts.build_server: cd server_build && go build -o GOBOL-LSP ./cmd/lsp/main.go && cd ..
scripts.install_server: mkdir server && mv server_build/GOBOL-LSP server/GOBOL-LSP && rm -rf server_build && chmod +x server/GOBOL-LSP
scripts.setup_server: npm run clone_server && npm run build_server && npm run install_server
